context_of_use: This use case allows power users to perform bulk actions to increase efficiency in their operations.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: Increase efficiency in handling operations.
description: Allows power users to perform bulk actions (imports, updates, deletes) to increase efficiency.
triggering_event: Power user initiates a bulk operation.
preconditions: Power user has access to bulk operation features.
postconditions: System reflects updated data after operations.
assumptions: Power user has the necessary permissions to perform bulk operations.
The system is operational and capable of handling bulk actions.
requirements_met: The system shall allow power users to handle bulk operations.
The system shall ensure that bulk operations are executed efficiently.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of bulk operations supported.
main_flow: 1. Power user initiates a bulk operation → System prompts for operation type.
2. Power user selects the operation type → System displays relevant options.
3. Power user provides necessary data for the operation → System processes the data.
4. System executes the bulk operation → System confirms successful execution.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 3): If the provided data is invalid, then the system displays an error message and prompts for correct data.
